title: Applications / Packages
description: Define applications / packages to install on Windows machine.

installSource.description: Define which command used to install packages

winget.description: Define `winget` cli settings to install packages

autoInstall.description: Whether or not automatically install `winget` if not found and install packages from the list

additionalArgs.description: Extra arguments passed in for `winget install [package]` command

choco.description: Define `choco` cli settings to install packages

autoInstall.description: Whether or not automatically install `choco` if not found and install packages from the list

additionalArgs.description: Extra arguments passed in for `choco install [package]` command

scoop.description: Define `scoop` cli settings to install packages

autoInstall.description: Whether or not automatically install `scoop` if not found and install packages from the list

packageScope.description: Install specified package for AllUsers (global) or CurrentUser (local) only

bucketList.description: List of scoop buckets to add

bucketRepo.description: Repository URL of a scoop bucket

additionalArgs.description: Extra arguments passed in for `scoop install [package]` command

packageAddon.description: Define extra addons for an installed package/application/tool

install.description: Whether or not to install the addons' list of a package

commandName.description: Command (application) which to use to install addons to

commandCheck.description: Command to check if an addon is installed or not

commandInvoke.description: Command to invoke to install a specified addon from the list

powershellModule.description: Define `Install-Module` PowerShell builtin cmdlet settings to install modules

install.description: Whether or not to install the PowerShell modules in the list

moduleList.description: List of PowerShell modules to install on the machine

additionalArgs.description: Extra arguments passed in for `Install-Module [module name]` command

environmentVariable.description: Define user environment variables and add them to the machine

commandName.description: The command which will use this environment variable

environmentKey.description: Environment variable key of specified command
